nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification

Class SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.auckland.morc.MorcBuilder<Builder>
      • nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification.OrchestratedTestSpecification.OrchestratedTestSpecificationBuilderInit<SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder>
        • nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification.SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder

  • public class SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
extends OrchestratedTestSpecification.OrchestratedTestSpecificationBuilderInit<SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder>
    A builder that generates a synchronous orchestrated test specification that will call a target endpoint that provides a response(s). During the request process the target may make a number of call outs to expectations which need to be satisfied. The response bodies from the target will also be validated against the expected response bodies.
    Author:
    David MacDonald - d.macdonald@auckland.ac.nz
